welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Addlestone, known for its picturesque canals and warm hospitality. We invite you to explore our city and soak in its unique charm. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: A modern and efficient terminal with all necessary amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Jet Terminal
terminals.description: A luxurious and exclusive terminal for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blackbushe Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport provides all necessary services for travelers including check-in, baggage claim, and security screenings.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at London Elstree Aerodrome Airport caters to VIP and private jet travelers, offering exclusive lounges and services.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Biggin Hill Airport caters to private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport offers a modern and efficient travel experience with a variety of amenities and services.

terminals.name: Private Jet Centre
terminals.description: For those traveling by private jet, the Private Jet Centre at London City Airport offers exclusive services and facilities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lasham Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Lasham Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Redhill Aerodrome serves both commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal for passengers to use.
